Cuerpo: Dagen i dag Dagen i dag er en merkelig dag. Den er din! Den kan ikke få annet innhold enn det du alt har gitt den. Du vet ikke om du kan regne med å råde over den. Men dagen i dag er det eneste du kan være sikker på. Den kan du fylle med hva du vil. I dag kan du leve slik at noen i kveld er glad for at du er til. Dagen i dag er en betydningsfull dag. Den er din! G. Brandes I've done my best to translate this, but I don't have a dictionary handy and some of the words were chosen for some connotations that just don't translate (I think). And I haven't been consistent on whether I'm translating words or meaning. The day today is a noteworthy day. It can't have anything else but what you have already given it. The day tomorrow you have no control over. You don't know if you can count on understanding it. But the day today is the only one you can be sure of. You can fill it with what you want. Today, you can live such that someone tonight is glad that you are here. The day today is a meaningful day. G. Brandes And my message is smile!
